body_html:
The nightly build of libtensorflow_inference.so for armeabi-v7a is 9.7 MB and has issue #8897.
The builds with -DTENSORFLOW_DISABLE_META and/or -DSELECTIVE_REGISTRATION are 120 MB - 180 MB and are not found by System.loadLibrary("tensorflow_inference") even under the exact same conditions.
body_text:
The nightly build of libtensorflow_inference.so for armeabi-v7a is 9.7 MB and has issue #8897.
The builds with -DTENSORFLOW_DISABLE_META and/or -DSELECTIVE_REGISTRATION are 120 MB - 180 MB and are not found by System.loadLibrary("tensorflow_inference") even under the exact same conditions.
body:
The nightly build of `libtensorflow_inference.so` for `armeabi-v7a` is 9.7 MB and has issue #8897.
The builds with `-DTENSORFLOW_DISABLE_META` and/or `-DSELECTIVE_REGISTRATION` are 120 MB - 180 MB and are not found by `System.loadLibrary("tensorflow_inference")` even under the exact same conditions.
